titleStmt.title: A particular accompt of the moneys paid into the Receipt of Exchequer, upon the late million act, for the benefit of survivorship containing the names of the several nominees, their ages, places of abode, the sums paid upon each nominee's life : as also, the deaths of such nominees as were certified into the office of the Receipt of Exchequer before the 24th of December, 1693 / examined by the Right Honourable Sir Robert Howard, Kt., auditor of the Receipt of Exchequer ; and printed by his direction.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Exchequer.

titleStmt.title: A particular accompt of the moneys paid into the Receipt of Exchequer, upon the late million act, for the benefit of survivorship containing the names of the several nominees, their ages, places of abode, the sums paid upon each nominee's life : as also, the deaths of such nominees as were certified into the office of the Receipt of Exchequer before the 24th of December, 1693 / examined by the Right Honourable Sir Robert Howard, Kt., auditor of the Receipt of Exchequer ; and printed by his direction.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Exchequer.
Howard, Robert, Sir, 1626-1698.

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 107:19 as Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) H3002, and at reel 219:9 as Wing P585 (number canceled in Wing CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library and British Library.
